title: Sparkling Diamond Chakra Bracelet - 'Vajra Bandhi'
features: Geometric design featuring a series of connected square frames, each showcasing a central diamond surrounded by a halo of smaller diamonds. Open-work setting allows maximum light penetration for enhanced sparkle. Modern interpretation of traditional kadiyam design.
colors: Rose Gold with brilliant white Diamonds.
occasions: or as a sophisticated everyday accessory. A stunning statement piece for a modern South Indian bride.
description: This 'Vajra Bandhi' bracelet effortlessly blends contemporary design with timeless elegance. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, the high-quality diamonds offer exceptional brilliance and fire. A versatile piece that can be styled with both traditional and modern outfits, making it a treasured addition to any jewelry collection. The rose gold lends a warm and romantic touch, complementing all skin tones.
